item.title: On super hot days, this insurance plan pays out cash for lost wages
item.description: It's called parametric insurance, it offers protection for climate-related wage losses and it's gaining ground in India.

item.title: Even healthy brains decline with age. Here's what you can do
item.description: Scientists are finding ways to minimize the effects of aging on the brain. Here are some ways to keep it healthy.

item.title: Exclusive: Trump team withholds $140 million budgeted for fentanyl fight
item.description: Threats to $140 million in funds for public health departments battling fentanyl overdoses comes as some experts see the addiction safety net unraveli...

item.title: What the National Suicide and Crisis Lifeline offers and how it's used
item.description: The National Suicide and Crisis Lifeline — 988 — launched on this day exactly three years ago. People who call the line seeking support are connected ...

item.title: Americans' medical debt can stay in credit reports, judge rules. What does that mean?
item.description: The judge's decision vacated a rule imposed by the Biden administration earlier this year to keep medical debt from affecting credit scores.
